item.title: Qubes GIS Installation Script
item.description: https://gist.github.com/44digits/e8452c4d3b796da29168f90e9edaf620 TL;DR: This bash script creates a desktop GIS AppVM Qube and a server AppVM Qube within QubeOS. All software is installed into a single TemplateVM. The software includes QGIS, PostGIS, GeoServer and other utilities. Firewall/iptables rules are setup to enable the desktop Qube to reach to server Qube. This script will work with both Debian and Fedora TemplateVMs. TS;WM: About a year ago I switched to QubesOS .
